72b5('bum): la'ang mi gnas so/ /skye mched drug ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /reg pa ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /tshor ba ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /sred pa ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /
72b6('bum): len pa ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /srid pa ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /skye ba ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /rga shi ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
72b7('bum): pa ni| gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /brtson 'grus kyi
73a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gang
73a2('bum): la'ang mi gnas so/ /nang stong pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /stong pa
73a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /'dus byas stong pa
73a4('bum): nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /thog ma
73a5('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas
73a6('bum): so| |chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang
73a7('bum): mi gnas so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ gang
73b1('bum): la'ang mi gnas so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/
73b2('bum): gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /dbang po lnga ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /stobs lnga ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas
73b3('bum): so| |'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /bsam gtan bzhi ni/ gang
73b4('bum): la'ang mi gnas so/ /tshad med pa bzhi ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad
73b5('bum): ni| gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
73b6('bum): dang / smon pa med pa ni gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /gzungs kyi
73b7('bum): sgo rnams ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /so
74a1('bum): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /byams pa chen po ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /snying rje chen po ni/ gang la'ang
74a2('bum): mi gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /lan gcig phyir
74a3('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /rang
74a4('bum): byang chub nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ gang la'ang mi
74a5('bum): gnas so/ de ltar mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
74a6('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu zhig shing tog a 'bra'am/ pa na sa za bar 'dod na/ des shing tog a 'bra'am/ shing tog pa na
74a7('bum): sa bskyed par bya'o/ /bskyed nas kyang dus dus su chus bcu'o/ /gnod pa bsal to/ /de rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i dbang gis mthar gyis 'phel nas shing tog am bra 'am/
74b1('bum): shing tog pa na sa yod par 'gyur te/ de shing tog am bra 'am/ shing tog pa na sa za bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
74b2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab ste/ sems can rnams sbyin pas rjes su gzung bar bya'o/ /tshul
74b3('bum): khrims kyis rjes su gzung bar bya'o/ /bzod pas rjes su gzung bar bya'o/ /brtson 'grus kyis rjes su gzung bar bya'o/ /bsam gtan gyis rjes su gzung bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyis rjes su
74b4('bum): gzung bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par
74b5('bum): 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa dang / snying po byang chub tu 'dug par 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bya'o//
74b6('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /zhes gsung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
74b7('bum): 'byor| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /zhes smra'o/ /chos thams cad la dbang du 'gyur bar 'thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol
75a1('bum): tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /zhes smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gis chos thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ba'i sa thob par 'gyur pa de ni/ shes rab kyi
75a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ 'di ltar dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ chu klung thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi
75a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
75a4('bum): tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
75a5('bum): phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
75a6('bum): bya'o| / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /stong pa
75a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /'dus ma byas
75b1('bum): byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab
75b2('bum): par bya'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
75b3('bum): la bslab par bya'o dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar
75b4('bum): gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bslab par bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o/ /dbang po lnga la bslab par bya'o/ /stobs lnga la bslab
75b5('bum): par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o/ /bsam
75b6('bum): gtan bzhi la bslab par bya'o/ /tshad med pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bya'o/ /
75b7('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bya'o/ /mngon par shes
76a1('bum): pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
76a2('bum): stobs bcu la bslab par bya'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o/ /byams pa chen po la bslab par bya'o/ /snying rje chen po
76a3('bum): la bslab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab par bya'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
76a4('bum): la bslab par bya'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bya'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rang byang chub la bslab par bya'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bslab par
76a5('bum): bya'o| |rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'phong gi slob dpon lag tshod dang 'byor ba'i gzhu thogs pa ni/ dgra dang
76a6('bum): phyir rgol ba rnams kyis thub par dka'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang bdud dam bdud kyi
76a7('bum): ris kyi lha rnams kyis thub par dka'o/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
76b1('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung
76b2('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs pa mdzad do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
76b3('bum): chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
76b4('bum): la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar shes
76b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar phyi nang stong pa
76b6('bum): nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar don dam
76b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji
77a1('bum): ltar mtha' las 'das la stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji
77a2('bum): ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spong pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs
77a3('bum): pa mdzad/ ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar dngos po med pa stong
77a4('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/
77a5('bum): ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
77a6('bum): la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar dbang po rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar stobs rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar byang chub kyi yan
77a7('bum): lag rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod
77b1('bum): pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms
77b2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
77b3('bum): dgu la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar mngon par
77b4('bum): shes pa rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar
77b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la
77b6('bum): spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar byams pa chen po la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar snying rje chen po la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos
77b7('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la
78a1('bum): spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs
78a2('bum): pa mdzad/ ji ltar rang byang chub la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
78a3('bum): nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
78a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang sbyin pa mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha
78a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang tshul khrims mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/
78a6('bum): ci nas kyang bzod pa mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang brtson 'grus mi dmigs pa de ltar
78a7('bum): dgongs pa mdzad do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang bsam gtan mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /shes rab kyi
78b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang shes rab mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /nang stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang
78b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /phyi stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /
78b3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad
78b4('bum): de| ci nas kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /chen po stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs
78b5('bum): pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /'dus byas
78b6('bum): stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad
78b7('bum): de| ci nas kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang mtha' las
79a1('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang
79a2('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang dor ba med pa stong pa
79a3('bum): nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa
79a4('bum): mdzad do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /rang gi mtshan
79a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la
79a6('bum): dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas
79a7('bum): kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs
79b1('bum): pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs
79b2('bum): pa mdzad do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /yang dag par
79b3('bum): spong pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs
79b4('bum): pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /dbang po rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang dbang po rnams
79b5('bum): mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /stobs rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang stobs rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /byang chub kyi
79b6('bum): yan lag rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag
79b7('bum): brgyad pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams spyod
80a1('bum): pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /bsam gtan rnams
80a2('bum): spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /tshad med pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas
80a3('bum): kyang tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad de/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang gzugs
80a4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang rnam par thar pa
80a5('bum): brgyad mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i
80a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa spyod pa la dgongs
80a7('bum): pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /mngon par shes pa
80b1('bum): rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci
80b2('bum): nas kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs
80b3('bum): pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs pa de ltar
80b4('bum): dgongs pa mdzad do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /so so yang dag par
80b5('bum): rig pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /byams pa chen po spyod pa la dgongs pa
80b6('bum): mdzad de/ ci nas kyang byams pa chen po mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /snying rje chen po spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa de
80b7('bum): ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa de
81a1('bum): ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs
81a2('bum): pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa de ltar
81a3('bum): dgongs pa mdzad do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /dgra
81a4('bum): bcom pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /rang byang chub spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad do/ ci
81a5('bum): nas kyang rang byang chub mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
81a6('bum): mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa de
81a7('bum): ltar dgongs pa mdzad do/ /de ltar mi dmigs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la dgongs pa mdzad do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
81b1('bum): pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya drug cu pa/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la
81b2('bum): gzugs su dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /'du shes su dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /'du byed du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /rnam par shes par dgongs
81b3('bum): pa mi mdzad do/ /mig tu dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /rna bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /snar dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /lcer dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ lus su dgongs pa mi mdzad
81b4('bum): do| |yid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ gzugs su dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /sgrar dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /drir dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /ror dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /reg tu
81b5('bum): dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /chos su dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /mig gi rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /sna'i rnam par
81b6('bum): shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /lce'i rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi
81b7('bum): mdzad do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /lce'i 'dus
82a1('bum): te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /
82a2('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
82a3('bum): tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /yid
82a4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /sa'i khams su dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /chu'i khams su dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /me'i khams su dgongs pa mi
82a5('bum): mdzad do/ /rlung gi khams su dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /nam mkha'i khams su dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams su dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /ma rig
82a6('bum): par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /'du byed du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /ming dang gzugs su dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /skye mched drug
82a7('bum): tu dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /sred par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /len par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /srid
82b1('bum): par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ skye bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /rga shir dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par
82b2('bum): dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
82b3('bum): par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /nang stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /phyi stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /phyi
82b4('bum): nang stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /chen po stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid du dgongs
82b5('bum): pa mi mdzad do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad
82b6('bum): do| / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /chos
82b7('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /dngos po
83a1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /
83a2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /yang dag par spong bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /dbang por dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /
83a3('bum): stobs su dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag tu dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /lam du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /'phags pa'i bden par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /bsam
83a4('bum): gtan du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /tshad med par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /rnam par thar par dgongs pa mi mdzad
83a5('bum): do| |mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /mtshan ma med par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /smon pa med par dgongs
83a6('bum): pa mi mdzad do/ /mngon par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /ting nge 'dzin du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /gzungs kyi sgor dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su dgongs
83a7('bum): pa mi mdzad do/ /mi 'jigs par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /so so yang dag par rig par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /byams pa chen por dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /snying rje chen por dgongs
83b1('bum): pa mi mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /phyir mi 'ong
83b2('bum): ba'i 'bras bur dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /rang byang chub tu dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /rnam pa thams cad
83b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas mang por yang bslab par bgyi la gang la'ang bslab par mi bgyi'o/ /
83b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas mang por yang bslab par bya ste/ gang la'ang bslab
83b5('bum): par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya ba'i chos de dag mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de
83b6('bum): ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di dag mdo dang rgyas par bstan na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang
83b7('bum): rgya bar 'tshal bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag mdo dang rgyas par kun chub bar bgyi'o/ /kun chub par bgyis nas tshig gis shin tu goms par bgyi'o/ /tshig gis shin tu goms par
84a1('bum): bgyis nas yid kyis rtogs par bgyi'o/ /de'ang ci nas kyang sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos mi rgyu ba de ltar rtogs par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
84a2('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po mdo dang rgyas par bstan pa 'di dag la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos
84a3('bum): thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas par 'tshal bar
84a4('bum): 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes na/
84a5('bum): chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/
84a6('bum): chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /mig gi de bzhin nyid shes
84a7('bum): na| chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /sna'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos
84b1('bum): thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /lce'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /lus kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo
84b2('bum): dang rgyas par shes par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang
84b3('bum): rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /sgra'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /dri'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par
84b4('bum): 'gyur ro/ /ro'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /reg gi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /
84b5('bum): chos kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par
84b6('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad
84b7('bum): kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
85a1('bum): shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ /chos thams cad kyi mdo dang
85a2('bum): rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid
85a3('bum): shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /lce'i
85a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang
85a5('bum): rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
85a6('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo
85a7('bum): dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /lce'i 'dus te
85b1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams
85b2('bum): cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /sa'i khams
85b3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /me'i
85b4('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /
85b5('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas
85b6('bum): pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa
85b7('bum): shes par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad
86a1('bum): kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /reg pa'i de
86a2('bum): nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas par shes par 'gyur ro/ /sred pa'i de bzhin
86a3('bum): nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /len pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /srid pa'i de
86a4('bum): bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rga shi'i
86a5('bum): de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes
86a6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin
86a7('bum): nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes
86b1('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin
86b2('bum): nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /phyi
86b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa
86b4('bum): shes par 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams
86b5('bum): cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid
86b6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes
86b7('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
87a1('bum): nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /dor pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad
87a2('bum): kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid
87a3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas
87a4('bum): pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med ba stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
87a5('bum): nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur
87a6('bum): ro| |dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de
87a7('bum): bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas
87b1('bum): pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos
87b2('bum): thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag
87b3('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams
87b4('bum): cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan
87b5('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes
87b6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa rnams
87b7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos
88a1('bum): thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid
88a2('bum): shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur
88a3('bum): ro| |ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams
88a4('bum): cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /mi
88a5('bum): 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos
88a6('bum): thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po'i
88a7('bum): de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo
88b1('bum): dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i
88b2('bum): de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par
88b3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo
88b4('bum): dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
88b5('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom
88b6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ gzugs kyi de bzhin
88b7('bum): nyid de| de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das
89a1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni
89a2('bum): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/
89a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ 'du
89a4('bum): shes kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/
89a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ 'du byed kyi
89a6('bum): de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/
89a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ rnam par
89b1('bum): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom
89b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ mig gi de bzhin
89b3('bum): nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
89b4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub
89b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sna'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid
89b6('bum): gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ sna'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
89b7('bum): pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ lce'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig
90a1('bum): pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ lce'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
90a2('bum): bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/

90a7('bum): gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
90b1('bum): sgra'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs

95b7('bum): dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/

96a2('bum): pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/
96a3('bum): 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /
96a4('bum): gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/
96a5('bum): gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
96a6('bum): 'das| sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas
96a7('bum): pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/
96b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/
96b2('bum): gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/
96b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa
96b4('bum): las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
96b5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du
96b6('bum): 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bsam
96b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du
97a1('bum): 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol
97a2('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/
97a3('bum): gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/
97a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa
97a5('bum): las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
97a6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba
97a7('bum): mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
97b1('bum): nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ phyi nang stong
97b2('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
97b3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la
97b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de
97b5('bum): bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
97b6('bum): dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi
97b7('bum): dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
98a1('bum): bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin
98a2('bum): nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems
98a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
98a4('bum): pa| de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la
98a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das
98a6('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de
98a7('bum): bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/
98b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa

98b4('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom
98b5('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
98b6('bum): nyid de| de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
98b7('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
99a1('bum): nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
99a2('bum): ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/
99a3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi

99a5('bum): 'di ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi
99a6('bum): de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs
99a7('bum): pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de
99b1('bum): bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ ngo bo
99b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji
99b3('bum): lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo
99b4('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/
99b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin
99b6('bum): nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
99b7('bum): stsal pa| de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub
100a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
100a2('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
100a3('bum): de| de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
100a4('bum): stsal pa| de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems
100a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang
100a6('bum): la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa lags gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
100a7('bum): pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye
100b1('bum): ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
100b2('bum): chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid
100b3('bum): gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
100b4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid
100b5('bum): gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
100b6('bum): chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/

101a1('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi

101a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom
101b1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
