101b3('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi
101b4('bum): dmigs pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol
101b5('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas
101b6('bum): pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
101b7('bum): 'das| ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi
102a1('bum): dmigs pa 'di ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs
102a2('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi
102a3('bum): dmigs pa 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
102a4('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs
102a5('bum): pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi
102a6('bum): de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/
102a7('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de
102b1('bum): bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ so so yang
102b2('bum): dag par rig pa rnams kyis de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom
102b3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid de/ de
102b4('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de
102b5('bum): bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
102b6('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de
102b7('bum): bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la
103a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/
103a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
103a3('bum): 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid
103a4('bum): ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/
103a5('bum): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyir mi 'ong
103a6('bum): ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du
103a7('bum): 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
103b1('bum): 'das| dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las
103b2('bum): gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
103b3('bum): rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba
103b4('bum): mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ lam gyi rnam pa
103b5('bum): shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur
103b6('bum): ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
103b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs/ 'jig pa mi dmigs/ gnas
104a1('bum): pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
104a2('bum): bslab par bya'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gang lags/ bcom
104a3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' med pa ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ mtha' 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas
104a4('bum): pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi dbyings shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro// //shes
104a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya re gcig pa/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi dbyings gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyings
104a6('bum): med pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings te/ chos kyi dbyings de la tshad pa dang / yongs su chad pa mi dmigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings de ltar shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
104a7('bum): po ni| chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan
104b1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci nas kyang chos thams cad ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin par shes par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ldan pa'ang ma lags/ mi
104b2('bum): ldan pa'ang ma lags pa'i chos de dag kyang gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /tshor ba ldan pa'ang ma yin/
104b3('bum): mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /'du shes ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /'du byed ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/
104b4('bum): mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /mig ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rna ba ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /sna ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin
104b5('bum): no| |lce ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /lus ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /yid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /gzugs ldan
104b6('bum): pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /sgra ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /dri ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /ro ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan
104b7('bum): pa'ang ma yin no/ /reg ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /chos ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang
105a1('bum): ma yin no/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin
105a2('bum): no| |lce'i rnam par shes pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa
105a3('bum): ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang
105a4('bum): ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
105a5('bum): ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ldan pa'ang
105a6('bum): ma yin| mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ldan
105a7('bum): pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
105b1('bum): ba ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /sa'i khams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang
105b2('bum): ma yin no/ /chu'i khams ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /me'i khams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rlung gi khams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma
105b3('bum): yin no| |nam mkha'i khams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /ma rig pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/
105b4('bum): mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /'du byed ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /ming dang gzugs ldan pa'ang ma
105b5('bum): yin| mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /skye mched drug ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /reg pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /tshor ba ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan
105b6('bum): pa'ang ma yin no/ /sred pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /len pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /srid pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin
105b7('bum): no| |skye ba ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rga shi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /
106a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin
106a2('bum): no| |brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /shes
106a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /phyi stong pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi
106a4('bum): ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /chen po stong
106a5('bum): pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi
106a6('bum): ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma
106a7('bum): yin no| |thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rang
106b1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ldan
106b2('bum): pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma
106b3('bum): yin no| |ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /dran pa nye bar
106b4('bum): gzhag pa rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ldan pa'ang
106b5('bum): ma yin| mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /dbang po rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /stobs rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi
106b6('bum): yan lag rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden
106b7('bum): pa rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /bsam gtan rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /tshad med pa rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan
107a1('bum): pa'ang ma yin no/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ldan pa'ang
107a2('bum): ma yin| mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
107a3('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin
107a4('bum): rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ldan pa'ang
107a5('bum): ma yin| mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma
107a6('bum): yin no| |byams pa chen po ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /snying rje chen po ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
107a7('bum): brgyad ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ldan pa'ang
107b1('bum): ma yin| mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /dgra bcom pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rang
107b2('bum): byang chub ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ldan la'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan pa'ang
107b3('bum): ma yin| mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /'dus byas kyi khams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin
107b4('bum): no| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ldan pa'ang mi ldan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid med de/ gang ngo bo nyid med pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa ni/ dngos po med pa
107b5('bum): dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ltar chos thams cad shes par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
107b6('bum): mdor bsdus pa ste/ mdor bsdus pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa
107b7('bum): bcu la gnas te/ mdor bsdus pa la bslab par bya'o/ /mdor bsdus pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas
108a1('bum): pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnon pos rtogs pa'o/ /bcom
108a2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po zhan pas kyang rtogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
108a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po dbang po 'bring pos kyang rtogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po mnyam par bzhag pas kyang rtogs par
108a4('bum): 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni/ slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba med do/ /'di ni/ le lo can gyis rtogs par 'gyur
108a5('bum): ba ma yin/ brtson 'grus zhan pas rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin/ dran pa nyams pas rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin/ sems 'khrugs pas rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ 'di ni/
108a6('bum): brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ le lo med pa/ dran pa nye bar gnas pas rtogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la slob par 'dod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
108a7('bum): 'dod pas rtogs par 'gyur pa ste/ gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
108b1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
108b2('bum): pa nyid thob par byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bdud kyi las ci byung yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad 'byung
108b3('bum): ba nyid kyi tshe rab tu spangs par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na/ thabs mkhas pas yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
108b4('bum): phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa dang
108b5('bum): s hes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba
108b6('bum): dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la dgongs pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha
108b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag las byung ba ni/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te/ de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
109a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ chos gang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
109a2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis brnyes par gyur pa dang / brnyes pa dang / brnyes par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag bdag gis kyang thob par bya'o/ snyam du brtag par bya ste/
109a3('bum): rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de ltar brtson par bya'o/ /de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
109a4('bum): dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
109a5('bum): pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya ste/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du de ltar
109a6('bum): spyod na| chung ngu na sa gol gtogs pa tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bsod nams ni/ ches mang du 'phel
109a7('bum): gyi| stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byas pa dang / tshul khrims la rab tu bkod pa
109b1('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin la rab tu bkod pa dang / shes rab la rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par grol ba la rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu bkod pa dang /
109b2('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid
109b3('bum): la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pas ni ma yin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di se gol gtogs pa tsam du bsgom pa de'i bsod nams ni/
109b4('bum): ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /
109b5('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub ni/ 'di las byung ba ste/ phyogs bcu'i
109b6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ngo / /
109b7('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las byung ngo / /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang skad 'ga'
110a1('bum): 'am| nyin 'ga' 'am/ nyi ma brgya'am/ lo 'ga' 'am/ lo brgya'am/ bskal pa 'ga' 'am/ bskal pa brgya nas bskal pa grangs med pa brgya'i bar
110a2('bum): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i yid la bya bas bsgom pa de'i bsod nams ni/ ches mang du 'phel gyi/ 'jig rten gyi khams
110a3('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad sbyin pa la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshul khrims la rab tu bkod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la rab
110a4('bum): tu bkod pa dang / shes rab la rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par grol ba la rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i
110a5('bum): 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu
110a6('bum): bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pas ni/ ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gis sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bstan pa dang / tshul khrims
110a7('bum): las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bstan pa dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bstan pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa dang /
110b1('bum): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bstan pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bstan pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid bstan pa dang / rang byang chub bstan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
110b2('bum): dag kyang 'di las byung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de ni/ phyir mi ldog par rig par bya ste/ byang
110b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs mkhas pa 'di dag dang ldan pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

110b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug

145b6('bum): stong pa nyid la dbri ba dang bsnan pa med par bslab par bya'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la dbri ba dang bsnan pa med par bslab par bya'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la dbri ba

146a1('bum): par bya'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dbri ba dang bsnan pa med par bslab par bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dbri ba dang

159a7('bum): du rna ba dang / sgra dang ji tsam du sna dang dri dang / ji tsam du lce dang ro dang / ji tsam du lus dang reg dang / ji tsam du yid dang chos dang / ji tsam du gzugs dang gzugs can dang / ji tsam

160a1('bum): nyams su myong bar byed pa dang / ji tsam du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyams su myong bar byed

160b6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ji tsam du chen po stong pa nyid dang chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ji tsam du don dam pa stong pa nyid dang don dam

163b7('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa med pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa med pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /

165a6('bum): ni| gnyis su med pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ dmigs su ma mchis pa mi dmigs sam/ ma lags te/ dmigs su ma mchis pa mi dmigs/

165b1('bum): dang mi dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid ni/ mi dmigs pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid la bslab

165b5('bum): rdzogs nas ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ji ltar thob par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
165b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ dmigs pa la gnas shing sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par mi byed de/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
165b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe dmigs pa la gnas te sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
166a1('bum): dmigs su med/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de'ang dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar
166a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
166a3('bum): pa dmigs su ma mchis te/ gang byang chub tu spyod pa de'ang dmigs su ma mchis pa lags na/ 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

166b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'o/ /'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /'di ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /

166b4('bum): gi khams so/ /'di ni/ nam mkha'i khams so/ /'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /'di ni/ ma rig pa'o/ 'di ni/ 'du byed do/ /'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di ni/ ming dang

173b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
173b7('bum): phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
174a1('bum): pa la mi spyod do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi
174a2('bum): spyod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /chen po stong pa
174a3('bum): nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi don du
174a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /'dus ma bya stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi don du
174a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du
174a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab
174a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha
174b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /
174b2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /yang dag par
174b3('bum): spong ba rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /dbang po rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha
174b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /stobs rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /'phags
174b5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi
174b6('bum): don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi don du shes
174b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha
175a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /mngon
175a2('bum): par shes pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi
175a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
175a4('bum): mi spyod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /byams pa chen po'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /snying rje chen po'i
175a5('bum): don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i don du shes
175a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol
175a7('bum): tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /rang byang chub kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa
175b1('bum): shes pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
175b2('bum): gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gi phyir yang byang chub sems
175b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni/ ma byas pa ste/ chos thams cad ni/ mngon par
175b4('bum): 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma byas pa ste/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /byang chub kyang ma byas pa ste/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /byang chub
175b5('bum): sems dpa' yang ma byas pa ste/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i
175b6('bum): tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar chos thams cad ma bgyis pa ste/ mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa lags
175b7('bum): na| 'o na ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po dang / theg pa gsum po 'di dag rnam par dgod par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
176a1('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ma byas mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i chos rnams la ni/ rnam par dgod pa gang yang dmigs su med de/ mngon par 'dus byas
176a2('bum): pa dang / mngon par bsams pa'i chos rnams la ni/ rnam par dgod par mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar byis pa thos pa dang mi ldan pa'i so so'i skye bo rnams phung
176a3('bum): po lnga la mngon par zhen cing / gzugs la mngon par zhen/ tshor ba la mngon par zhen/ 'du shes la mngon par zhen/ 'du byed la mngon par zhen/ rnam par shes pa la mngon

178a1('bum): nas gzugs kyis rlom sems su byed cing gzugs su dmigs so/ /tshor bas rlom sems su byed cing tshor bar dmigs so/ /'du shes kyis rlom

180a1('bum): sems su byed cing don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed cing 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs so/ /
