211b3('bum): gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis byams pa chen por gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis snying rje
211b4('bum): chen por gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur gdags pa dang /
211b5('bum): de bzhin nyid gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis dgra bcom pa
211b6('bum): nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rang byang chub tu gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam pa
211b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'dus byas kyi khams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi bar du gdags pa de dag
212a1('bum): thams cad kyang de kho na bzhin te/ de bas na/ de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin nyid de la bslab cing rnam
212a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ de bzhin nyid tshad mar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'
212a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol
212a4('bum): tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing chos thams cad kyi de
212a5('bum): bzhin nyid la slob bo/ /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la bslab cing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs
212a6('bum): par byas shing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du 'gyur ba thob par byed do/ /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du 'gyur ba thob par byas shing sems can thams
212a7('bum): cad kyi dbang po la mkhas par byed do/ /dbang po la mkhas par byas shing dbang po yongs su bskang ba la mkhas pa thob par byed do/ /dbang po yongs su bskang ba la mkhas pa thob
212b1('bum): par byas shing sems can rnams kyi las rang gis byas pa shes par byed do/ /sems can rnams kyi rang gi las shes bar byas shing smon pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /smon
212b2('bum): pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byas shing dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag par byed do/ /dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag par byas shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas
212b3('bum): sems can rnams kyi don byed do/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
212b4('bum): pa nyid thob par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god do/ /
212b5('bum): sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu bkod nas phung po lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub
212b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yon tan dang legs pa thams cad mthong nas bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/ /gzhan
212b7('bum): yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
213a1('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi
213a2('bum): bar 'os pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
213a3('bum): pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
213a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
213a5('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen

213a7('bum): nams mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ tshad ma mchis so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ tshad
213b1('bum): ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang
213b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur ba'i bsod nams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams las/ byang chub sems dpa'

213b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa de dag gi bsod nams des brgya'i chir yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /
213b5('bum): bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag

214a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa

214b7('bum): chen po rnams ma yin no/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ gal te stong

215a6('bum): no| |stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi / gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
215a7('bum): g yi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad brgyad pa'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi
215b1('bum): brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye

215b7('bum): gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char
216a1('bum): yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /grangs su'ang mi bzod/ char yang mi bzod/ bgrang bar yang mi
216a2('bum): bzod| dper yang mi bzod/ rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ mthong ba'i sa rnams te/ mthong ba'i sa las byung ba ni/ byang chub
216a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta
216a4('bum): zhog gi / gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad bsrabs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des byang
216a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /
216a6('bum): bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye
216a7('bum): ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /grangs su'ang mi bzod/ char yang mi bzod/ bgrang bar yang mi bzod/ dper yang mi bzod/ rgyur yang mi bzad do/ /de
216b1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ bsrabs pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/ bsrabs pa'i sa las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma
216b2('bum): yin no| |stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad bsrabs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi / gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
216b3('bum): ' jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed
216b4('bum): pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba
216b5('bum): brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar
216b6('bum): mi 'gro'o/ /grangs su'ang mi bzod/ char yang mi bzod/ bgrang bar yang mi bzod/ dper yang mi bzod/ rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las
216b7('bum): byung ba ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/ /
217a1('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi /gal
217a2('bum): t e stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems
217a3('bum): dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba'i
217a4('bum): char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char
217a5('bum): yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /grangs su'ang mi bzod/ char yang mi bzod/ bgrang bar yang mi bzod/ dper yang mi bzod/ rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las
217a6('bum): byung ba ni byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/ byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/ /stong gsum gyi
217a7('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi / gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
217b1('bum): k yi sems can de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char
217b2('bum): yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba stong gi
217b3('bum): char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /grangs su'ang mi bzod/ char yang mi bzod/
217b4('bum): bgrang bar yang mi bzod/ dper yang mi bzod/ rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnams te/ rang sangs rgyas las byung ba
217b5('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par
217b6('bum): gyur pa lta zhog gi / gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod
217b7('bum): nams des byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu zhugs pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /brgya phrag stong gi char yang
218a1('bum): nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya phrag
218a2('bum): stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /grangs su'ang mi bzod/ /char yang mi bzod/ bgrang bar yang mi bzod/ dper yang
218a3('bum): mi bzod/ rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par gyur pa lta zhog gi /gal te stong
218a4('bum): g sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad byang chub tu zhugs par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
218a5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /

218a7('bum): khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /grangs su 'ang mi bzod/ bgrang bar yang mi bzod/ dper yang mi bzod/ rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom
218b1('bum): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pas ci yid la bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la
218b2('bum): bya'o| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dngos po ji lta bu zhig mchis/ dmigs pa ji lta bu zhig mchis/ rnam pa ji lta bu zhig mchis/ mtshan nyid ji
218b3('bum): lta bu zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni/ dngos po med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med
218b4('bum): pa| byed pa med pa/ skye ba med pa/ 'byung ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor/ gang yang 'di skad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ji lta bu zhig yod ces zer ba ni/ rab 'byor/
218b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ dmigs pa med pa ste/ dran pas dbang sgyur ba/ zhi ba'i rnam pa mtshan nyid med pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
218b6('bum): pa nyid kyi dmigs pa'o/ /'di ni/ dbang sgyur ba'o/ /'di ni/ rnam pa'o/ /'di ni/ mtshan nyid do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
218b7('bum): 'ba' zhig dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/ ma lags kyi/ gzugs kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ 'du shes kyang dngos po ma
219a1('bum): mchis pa lags/ 'du byed kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ mig kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/

219a4('bum): lags/ reg kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ chos kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ rna ba'i rnam par

219a6('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/
219a7('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/
219b1('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma

219b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
219b4('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ sa'i khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ chu'i khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ me'i khams kyang dngos
219b5('bum): po ma mchis pa lags/ rlung gi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ nam mkha'i khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang dngos po
219b6('bum): ma mchis pa lags/ ma rig pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ 'du byed kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/
219b7('bum): ming dang gzugs kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ skye mched drug kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ reg pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ tshor ba'ang dngos po ma
220a1('bum): mchis pa lags/ sred pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ len pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ srid pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa
220a2('bum): lags| skye ba'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ rga shi'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ tshul khrims
220a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po

220a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ stong pa nyid
220a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/
220a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang
220b1('bum): dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ rang bzhin
220b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ mi
220b3('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma
220b4('bum): mchis pa lags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ yang dag
220b5('bum): par spong ba rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ dbang po rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/
220b6('bum): stobs rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang dngos po
220b7('bum): ma mchis pa lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ bsam gtan rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ tshad med pa rnams
221a1('bum): kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ rnam par thar pa rnams
221a2('bum): kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
221a3('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa
221a4('bum): lags| gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang
221a5('bum): dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa
221a6('bum): lags| byams pa chen po'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ snying rje chen po'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ dga' ba chen po'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ btang
221a7('bum): snyoms chen po'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ bcom
221b1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /gzugs kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /'du
221b2('bum): shes kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /'du byed kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /mig kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /rna ba'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /sna'ang dngos

221b6('bum): shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /lce'i
221b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang
222a1('bum): dngos po med pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /
222a2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
222a3('bum): ba'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /sa'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /chu'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /me'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /rlung gi khams kyang dngos po med
222a4('bum): pa'o| |nam mkha'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /ma rig pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /'du byed kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /
222a5('bum): rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /ming dang gzugs kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /skye mched drug kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /reg pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /tshor ba'ang dngos po
222a6('bum): med pa'o/ /sred pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /len pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /srid pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /skye ba'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /rga shi'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i
222a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
222b1('bum): phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /
222b2('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /don dam pa
222b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po
222b4('bum): med pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /chos
222b5('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
222b6('bum): kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang dngos po
222b7('bum): med pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /dbang po rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /stobs rnams kyang dngos po
223a1('bum): med pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden
223a2('bum): pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /bsam gtan rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /tshad med pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang
223a3('bum): dngos po med pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
223a4('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /gzungs
223a5('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa
223a6('bum): rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /byams pa chen po'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /snying rje chen po'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /
223a7('bum): dga' ba chen po'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /btang snyoms chen po'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /'dus byas kyi khams kyang dngos po med pa'o/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po med
223b1('bum): pa'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med de/ rab 'byor/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /gsol
223b2('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid
223b3('bum): med de| gang la 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ltar
223b4('bum): yang chos thams cad ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /chos thams cad ni/ mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /chos thams cad ni/ smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di
223b5('bum): ltar yang chos thams cad ni/ de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /chos thams cad ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid do/ /chos thams cad ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /rab 'byor/
223b6('bum): rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i
223b7('bum): ngo bo nyid lags na/ 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa thabs gang dang ldan pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
224a1('bum): su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
224a2('bum): dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs
224a3('bum): su smin par bgyid pa lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/
224a4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
224a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ bsam gtan dang po la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi
224a6('bum): zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems
224a7('bum): can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ bsam gtan gsum pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa
224b1('bum): lags| bsam gtan bzhi pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ byams pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing
224b2('bum): yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ snying rje la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par
224b3('bum): bgyid pa lags/ dga' ba la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ btang snyoms la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi
224b4('bum): zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems
224b5('bum): can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid
224b6('bum): pa lags/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ 'du shes med 'du shes
224b7('bum): med min skye mched la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
225a1('bum): dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams
225a2('bum): yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ stong pa nyid

225a6('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod
225a7('bum): cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
225b1('bum): dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin
225b2('bum): par bgyid pa lags/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ chos thams cad stong pa
225b3('bum): nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing

225b5('bum): yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ ngo bo nyid

225b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /

226a5('bum): par bgyid pa lags/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/

226a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ tshad med pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems
226b1('bum): can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin

226b5('bum): dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par
226b6('bum): bgyid pa lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
226b7('bum): bcu la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
227a1('bum): pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /

227a7('bum): bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ltar chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yongs su 'dris par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing
227b1('bum): yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang / sems can de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa de nyid byang
227b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la
227b3('bum): yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub
227b4('bum): kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
227b5('bum): spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /nang stong pa nyid la
227b6('bum): spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi
227b7('bum): lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su
228a1('bum): 'dris par byed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing

228a3('bum): la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /dor ba med
228a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /chos thams
228a5('bum): cad stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed
228a6('bum): do| |mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su
228a7('bum): 'dris par byed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris
228b1('bum): par byed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par
228b2('bum): byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /dbang po rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /stobs rnams
228b3('bum): la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag
228b4('bum): brgyad pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /bsam gtan rnams
228b5('bum): la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /tshad med pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
228b6('bum): pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
228b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam
229a1('bum): la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams
229a2('bum): la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
229a3('bum): stobs rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /so so
229a4('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris
229a5('bum): par byed do/ /byams pa chen po la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /snying rje chen po la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par
229a6('bum): byed do| |thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs
229a7('bum): su 'dris par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /byang chub kyi lam de'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
229b1('bum): du rab tu shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang /
229b2('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan par ma gyur pa
229b3('bum): dang / byams pa chen po dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par ma gyur pa de'i bar du byang chub
229b4('bum): kyi lam de la yongs su 'dris par byed do/ rab 'byor/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste/ lam de la gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /pha
229b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe de'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor
229b6('bum): ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang mi skye bar spang bas yongs su spong bar 'gyur te/ de sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la rnam par lta na/ dngos
229b7('bum): po med par yang mi dmigs na/ dngos po yod pa lta smos kyang mi smos/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya re drug pa/ /rab 'byor/
230a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/ de de ltar sbyin pa yongs
230a2('bum): su gtong yang mi rtog / mtshan mar mi byed do/ dngos po yod pa 'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /len par yang mi rtog /mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod
230a3('bum): pa'am dngos pa med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /gtong ba la'ang mi rtog /mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /byang
230a4('bum): chub kyi sems de'ang mi dmigs te/ mtshan mar mi byed/ yul du mi byed/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshul khrims
230a5('bum): srung ste| de de ltar tshul khrims srung yang mi rtog / mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /byang chub kyi sems de'ang mi dmigs
230a6('bum): te| mtshan mar mi byed/ yul du mi byed/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bzod pa sgom ste/ de de ltar bzod pa sgom yang mi
230a7('bum): rtog / mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /byang chub kyi sems de'ang mi dmigs te/ mtshan mar mi byed/ yul du mi
230b1('bum): byed| yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de de ltar brtson 'grus rtsom yang mi rtog /mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos
230b2('bum): po yod pa'am/ dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /byang chub kyi sems de'ang mi dmigs te/ mtshan mar mi byed/ yul du mi byed/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shes
230b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug ste/ de de ltar bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug kyang mi rtog /mtshan mar mi byed de/
230b4('bum): dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /byang chub kyi sems de'ang mi dmigs te/ mtshan mar mi byed/ yul du mi byed/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
230b5('bum): ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom ste/ de de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom yang mi rtog /mtshan mar mi byed de/
230b6('bum): dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /gang shes rab sgom pa de la'ang mi rtog /mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa 'am dngos po med par yang
230b7('bum): yid la mi byed do/ /sems can gang gi don du shes rab de la sgom pa de dag la'ang mi rtog /mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /
231a1('bum): nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe nang stong pa nyid la mi rtog /mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa 'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do//

238a4('bum): rig pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe so so yang dag par rig pa de dag la mi rtog / mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa 'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /gang so so yang
238a5('bum): dag par rig pa de dag la sgom pa de la'ang mi rtog / mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /sems can gang gi don du so so yang
238a6('bum): yang dag par rig pa de dag la sgom pa de la'ang mi rtog / mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /byams pa chen po la spyod pa'i
238a7('bum): tshe byams pa chen po de la mi rtog / mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /gang byams pa chen po de la sgom pa de la'ang mi
238b1('bum): rtog / mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /sems can gang gi don du byams pa chen po de la sgom pa de la'ang mi rtog /mtshan mar mi
238b2('bum): byed de| dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe snying rje chen po de la mi rtog /mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos
238b3('bum): po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /gang snying rje chen po de la sgom pa de la'ang mi rtog /mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /sems
238b4('bum): can gang gi don du snying rje chen po de la sgom pa de la'ang mi rtog / mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
238b5('bum): rnams la spyod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag la mi rtog / mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

238b7('bum): 'dres pa de dag la sgom pa de la'ang mi rtog / mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe thams
239a1('bum): cad shes pa nyid de la mi rtog / mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /gang thams cad shes pa nyid de la sgom
239a2('bum): pa de la'ang mi rtog / mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /sems can gang gi don du thams cad shes pa nyid de la sgom pa de la'ang
239a3('bum): mi rtog / mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de la mi rtog /

239a7('bum): mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du'ang mi rtog /mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos
239b1('bum): po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs
239b2('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba de la'ang mi rtog / mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni/ dngos
239b3('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad/ rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams kyis kyang ma byas te/ chos thams cad ni/ byed pa po med pa/ byed pa po dang bral
239b4('bum): ba'o| |rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar lags na/ chos rnams chos rnams nyid dang bral ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
239b5('bum): de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ chos rnams ni/ chos rnams nyid dang bral ba'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar chos rnams chos rnams nyid dang bral
239b6('bum): ba lags na/ ji ltar chos kyis chos la dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba'am/ dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi bar yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po ma mchis
239b7('bum): pa'i chos kyis dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos yongs su 'tshal bar mi rung ste/ dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos yongs su 'tshal bar mi rung ngo / /dngos
240a1('bum): po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po mchis pa'i chos yongs su 'tshal bar mi rung do/ /dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po ma mchis pa'i
240a2('bum): chos 'tshal bar mi rung ngo / /de ltar chos thams cad yongs su 'tshal pa ma mchis pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta dngos po mchis pa'am/ dngos po ma
240a3('bum): mchis par sems par yang dag la 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/
240a4('bum): tshe 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob nye bar bzung bas dngos po yod ces bya ba'am dngos po med ces bya bar ston te/ don dam par ni/ ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/

240a7('bum): sems can de dag phyir ci log tu gyur pas de bzhin nyid de mi shes mi mthong ste/ de dag gis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyis dngos
240b1('bum): po yod ces bya ba'am dngos po med ces bya bar brjod do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ltar yang sems can gang ji snyed cig phung po lnga la dngos po yod pa'i 'du shes su gyur te/ dngos po med

247a1('bum): nyid kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /de ni/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /de ni/ chos nyid kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /de ni/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi
